mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_userinfo WHERE status_yn IN ('N')
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM tb_payment_his WHERE pay_status = 2
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(paid_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) AS earnings FROM tb_payment_his WHERE pay_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(paid_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS memberCount FROM tb_userinfo WHERE status_yn IN ('N') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalUsers, SUM(CASE WHEN user_no NOT IN (SELECT user_no FROM tb_payment_his) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS generalUsers, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN user_no IN (SELECT user_no FROM tb_payment_his) THEN user_no END) AS subscribedUsers FROM tb_userinfo WHERE status_yn IN ('N')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_userinfo u WHERE status_yn IN ('N') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_payment_his p WHERE p.user_no = u.user_no )

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN product_no = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS subscribe1, SUM(CASE WHEN product_no = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS subscribe2, SUM(CASE WHEN product_no = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS subscribe3, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS expire_days_null_count FROM tb_userinfo WHERE expire_days IS NULL) AS normal FROM tb_payment_his

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_userinfo
AND (login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
AND user_type IN ('A', 'B')
AND user_type = #{type}
